statement.p: Here is a figure made of a circle inscribed in a square.
If the radius of the circle is 6.0 mi:
(a) What is the area of the square? \displaystyle{m}{i}^{{2}}
(b) What is the area of the circle? Round to the nearest tenth. \displaystyle{m}{i}^{{2}}
(c) What is the area of the shaded section? \displaystyle{m}{i}^{{2}}
